about_the_game:
The beloved online browser-based C&C title has arrived on Steam! Invite your friends to join the battle! Enter the legendary Command & Conquer universe, where the epic conflict between the formidable Global Defense Initiative (GDI) and the mysterious Brotherhood of Nod (NOD) continues. Command & Conquer: Tiberium Alliances introduces an innovative twist on classic gameplay, immersing you in a dynamic, ever-evolving world of endless strategic possibilities. This captivating free-to-play browser game offers a rich experience within the cherished Command & Conquer universe. Choose between two iconic factions—GDI and NOD—each with unique buildings, offensive units, and defensive units. Forge powerful alliances, strategize with friends, and dominate the battlefield in a game that rewards tactical skill and cooperation. Enjoy months of gameplay as you expand your base, enhance your units, and rise through the ranks in this dynamic, resource-driven war.
Join the fight today and experience the next evolution in Command & Conquer!

BUILD YOUR EMPIRE
Choose your side and style of battle to secure victory. Construct your base with 15 different buildings. Build an army with 14 unique offensive units and 15 defensive units per faction. Research new tactics and weapons to make your forces unstoppable.

CRUSH YOUR ENEMIES
Unleash your strategic mind on a grand scale, collect resources, and empower your forces. Team up with friends and forge strategic alliances in-game. Storm the battlefield and destroy enemy bases in Player vs. Player and Player vs. Environment battles.

CONQUER THE WORLD
Prove your strategic prowess on a global stage. Join the Command & Conquer: Tiberium Alliances World Championship and compete against top players worldwide. Form alliances, strategize with friends, and dominate the competition to become the ultimate champion.

The beloved online browser-based C&C title has arrived on Steam! Invite your friends to join the battle! Enter the legendary Command & Conquer universe, where the epic conflict between the formidable Global Defense Initiative (GDI) and the mysterious Brotherhood of Nod (NOD) continues. Command & Conquer: Tiberium Alliances introduces an innovative twist on classic gameplay, immersing you in a dynamic, ever-evolving world of endless strategic possibilities. This captivating free-to-play browser game offers a rich experience within the cherished Command & Conquer universe. Choose between two iconic factions—GDI and NOD—each with unique buildings, offensive units, and defensive units. Forge powerful alliances, strategize with friends, and dominate the battlefield in a game that rewards tactical skill and cooperation. Enjoy months of gameplay as you expand your base, enhance your units, and rise through the ranks in this dynamic, resource-driven war.
Join the fight today and experience the next evolution in Command & Conquer!

Choose your side and style of battle to secure victory. Construct your base with 15 different buildings. Build an army with 14 unique offensive units and 15 defensive units per faction. Research new tactics and weapons to make your forces unstoppable.

Unleash your strategic mind on a grand scale, collect resources, and empower your forces. Team up with friends and forge strategic alliances in-game. Storm the battlefield and destroy enemy bases in Player vs. Player and Player vs. Environment battles.

legal_notice:
Internet connection; EA Account; Steam Account; acceptance of the EA User Agreement (terms.ea.com); and download & installation of EA's client software (origin.com/download) or EA app (ea.com/ea-app) required to play. EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy applies to your use of EA's services. You consent to any personal data collected through your use of EA's services being transferred to the United States, as further explained in the Privacy & Cookie Policy. You must link your EA and Steam Accounts to play; EA will share your Account ID and individual game and play records with Steam to validate your purchase and/or refund request. Access to software content is limited to one EA & one Steam Account & is non-transferable after purchase. You may need to be 13+ or 16+ to register for an EA Account (age may vary, see o.ea.com/ea/child-access for details). Some content may require gameplay to unlock. Content updates may be downloaded automatically, require additional storage, and incur bandwidth usage fees. EA may provide certain free incremental content &/or updates. EA may retire online features after 30 days notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

EA User Agreement: terms.ea.com/de for German residents and terms.ea.com for all other residents
EA Privacy & Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/de for German residents and privacy.ea.com for all other residents
name: Command & Conquer™ Tiberium Alliances

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 @ 2.4ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400 @ 2.4ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 420 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690K or AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: From the genre-defining RTS franchise Command & Conquer comes a unique, free-to-play strategic warfare MMO experience!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
